stimulusHtml: Which of the following best represents an investment in human capital?
choicesHtml: A clothing manufacturer purchases automated machinery.
An automobile manufacturer hires an engineer who specializes in maintaining modern robotic assembly machines.
A bank pays the tuition for one of its managers to pursue a degree in business administration.
A paper mill offers a bonus to an employee who develops a more efficient way to incentivize workers to work more night shifts.
A manufacturing firm builds a new assembly line.
